channel.title: CVE Feed for Mufeng -- Hermit 音乐播放器 (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mufeng -- Hermit 音乐播放器 (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29413|2024-09-17T03:54:45.517Z -- mufeng -- hermit%20%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E6%92%AD%E6%94%BE%E5%99%A8%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) leading to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Mufeng's Hermit 音乐播放器 plugin <= 3.1.6 on WordPress via &title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2022-29411|2024-09-17T02:16:01.404Z -- mufeng -- hermit%20%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90%E6%92%AD%E6%94%BE%E5%99%A8%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability in Mufeng's Hermit 音乐播放器 plugin <= 3.1.6 on WordPress allows attackers to execute SQLi attack via (&id).
